children.text: Sorry this channel is temporarily unavailable

RT America broadcasts from its own studio in Washington, DC  and goes on air during America’s prime time to cover the latest global headlines and analyze critical issues in American politics.  On their exclusive programs, Larry King, Abby Martin, Thom Hartmann and Max Keiser debate hot-button topics that no one else in the media dares to touch. RT America championed the coverage of the Occupy Wall Street movement, which won RT its second International Emmy nomination, and hosted the Third Party Debate ahead of the 2012 US Presidential election.
